Articles.Content:
When someone says to you "s.s.t.o"(single stage to orbit) you think about a plane,its right but it doesn't need to be a plane,it can be a rocket(only in KSP not in real life),i will call it S.S.T.O.M(single stage to orbit Mun),watch this video:

http://youtu.be/pAnEoNX1BNs

Mods used: ProceduralParts

Enjoy!
